TopicTitle: Can't change craft/vessel name in tracking station permanently.

Articles.Content:
It's impossible to rename a ship in the Tracking station. When you edit a name the line for KSP change, not the line of the ship you were editing. When you exit the tracking station and come back the KSP line is now back to KSP but the name of the ship still has the old name.

Also the name is barely visible when editing.

Edited July 9, 2023 by Anth12
I have also encountered this issue.
I ran into that issue. Reloading my save fixed it. Not sure what I did to trigger the bug the first time.

Renaming the vessel does not stick and it reverts back to its previous name or sometimes creates duplicate entries with the old name

System Details

  • KSP Version: 0.1.0.0.20892
  • Operating System: Windows 11 Pro 10.0.22621 Build 2262
  • CPU: 12th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-12700H
  • GPU: NVIDIA RTX A2000 8GB Laptop GPU 
  • GPU Driver Version    31.0.15.282
  • RAM: 32GB
Edited February 26, 2023 by CyberSiren
I encountered this as well and even renamed the mun by clicking off my craft onto the mun
Same problem on my side. I tried renaming a vessel and it renamed some other debris.
Can confirm also expérienced this bug, rather frustrating.
Also reported here:

20 hours ago, VirtualBundy said:

It's impossible to rename a ship in the Tracking station. When you edit a name the line for KSP change, not the line of the ship you were editing. When you exit the tracking station and come back the KSP line is now back to KSP but the name of the ship still has the old name.

Also the name is barely visible when editing.

I'm able to successfully rename a ship in the tracking station if I focus the ship before renaming it.
Same experience for me. If you focus on the vessel you want to rename it does rename the correct vessel, but doesn't save upon re-entering tracking station.

On 2/26/2023 at 2:49 PM, QuantumG said:

Same experience for me. If you focus on the vessel you want to rename it does rename the correct vessel, but doesn't save upon re-entering tracking station.

same here what a drag

What I did: Edited the vessel name in the tracking station.

Expected Result: The vessel name should persist.

Actual Result: The vessel name reverts back to the previously defined name.

 

Steps to Reproduce:

1.) Create a Vessel in the VAB, save as "Fly Safe" and launch to orbit.

2.) Go to Tracking Station and Edit Vessel Name, change from "Fly Safe" to anything else.

3.) Exit Tracking Station, Return to Tracking Station
+1 this issue.
Yep, and also this:

Ditto.  Renaming anything in tracking station only renames the KSC, even if I never select the KSC after entiering Tracking Station.  Renaming doesn't survive leaving and re-entering tracking station.  I have never seen the game rename what I had selected to the new name, or have that renaming stick.
Also - if you hit the Shift key to capitalize... your rockets throttle up!

19 minutes ago, JoeSchmuckatelli said:

Also - if you hit the Shift key to capitalize... your rockets throttle up!

No capitals, no "Z" and no "X"

When you rename a vehicle in the Tracking Station it doesn't save. Ive been able to replicate this on every vehicle I put into orbit. I focus it in the tracking station and rename the vessel. Then when i go to the VAB or any other facility and return to the tracking station the vehicle is no longer what i named it and is back to its original name. This is very detrimental to gameplay. 

Edited April 13, 2023 by OopsThatNotWork
Even with the latest patch, renaming doesn't stick. It reverts back even if you re-focus on the object you just renamed.

2 hours ago, ralexpdx said:

Even with the latest patch, renaming doesn't stick. It reverts back even if you re-focus on the object you just renamed.

If it helps, there’s a mod that allows you to rename your vessels in flight. It’s called Vessel Renamer.

This bug has been with us since the first day and is well documented. There is a workaround if you’re willing to use mods. Just look for Vessel Renamer. It will allow you to rename your vessels in flight.
Did they fix the bug where when you tried to rename a ship, the engines engaged?

Meanwhile i was able to change the name by editing the save json file located in AppData\LocalLow\Intercept Games\Kerbal Space Program 2\Saves\SinglePlayer\@yoursavename

Look for the vessle name and change it everywhere it appears... when reloading the save it is changed
Merged 2 bug reports into this one.

Reported Version: v0.1.3 (latest) | Mods: Spacewarp, Bepin, Custom Flags, Maneuver Node Controller, Speedy Startup | Can replicate without mods? Yes 
OS: Windows 10 | CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-7700K CPU @ 4.20GHz | GPU: RTX 3070 | RAM: 32 GB

 

As the title says, if you change a vessels name in the tracking station it will revert to the original name after you leave and enter the tracking station again. It was buggy in the release version, 4 month later still present.
